actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to increased Federal efforts to prove the commercial viability of sailing ships.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Federal Government should accelerate its development of commercial sailing ships. States that the budget of specified departments should include funds to prove the commercial viability of sailing ships.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to increased Federal efforts to prove the commercial viability of sailing ships.
